channel.title: Jtag
channel.description:
Recently my PS3 got that fantastic yellow light of death.. due to the fact that Xbox Ones are out now I got a 360 dirt cheap. Only issue is now im restarting from scratch in MW2 (My favorite game - judge me), so I was wondering if anyone who has a JTAG is hosting modded lobbies and wouldn't mind inviting me.
Would be much appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Jtag
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Vix, post:1, topic:537085”]MW2 (My favorite game - judge me)[/quote]kk.

[quote=“sinisoul, post:3, topic:537085”]Yellow light? I have never heard of this before.[/quote]Neither have I until now.

[quote=“Chronikk_HD, post:6, topic:537085”]yeaaaa it was actually pretty rare compared to the RRoD, but when the yellow light hit it wasn’t like the RRoD where a simple restart could fix it, it’s fudgeed pretty much .[/quote]A restart wouldn’t fix it if it had four red bars instead of three (or vice versa, I can’t remember).

Read full topic

item.title: Jtag
item.dc:creator: @mattr91 mattr91
item.description:
@mattr91 wrote:

[quote=“Vix, post:1, topic:537085”]Recently my PS3 got that fantastic yellow light of death… due to the fact that Xbox Ones are out now I got a 360 dirt cheap. Only issue is now im restarting from scratch in MW2 (My favorite game - judge me), so I was wondering if anyone who has a JTAG is hosting modded lobbies and wouldn’t mind inviting me.

Would be much appreciated, thanks.[/quote]
YLOD is easy to fix just open your ps3 and clean all the shit out of it its due to overheating I buy them off ebay cheap as chips with ylod and resell

Read full topic

if it’s your favourite game play it and don’t cheat it. i don’t see the logic in this ??

item.title: Jtag
item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

sinisoul:

Yellow light? I have never heard of this before.

yeaaaa it was actually pretty rare compared to the RRoD, but when the yellow light hit it wasn’t like the RRoD where a simple restart could fix it, it’s fucked pretty much .

Read full topic

item.title: Jtag
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:3, topic:537085”]Yellow light? I have never heard of this before.[/quote]Happens when synchronisation fails on any of the workflow wavefronts. This isn’t a problem in itself but is almost always caused by an underlying hardware failure in the GPU.

Read full topic

item.title: Jtag
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

sinisoul:

Yellow light? I have never heard of this before.

Major hardware failure. Most common is gpu overheating or a bad connection

Read full topic

item.title: Jtag
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Hey not judging you bceause mw2 is a lot of peoples favorite game including mine. I actually have a jtag but buying a KV for one person would be a waste of money. I’ll do a recovery unlock all, and the prestiege of your choice for free. Message me for more info. If you need proof i’m currently 6th in the world for cod ghosts and I can link you to a youtube channel.

Read full topic
